genre_description: An interdimensional space opera and domestic drama involving pocket realities, spiritual entities, and sentient AI diagnostic systems.

ai_characters.name: Kei
ai_characters.description: A compact AI with optical sensors and quantum analytical capabilities that assists the Masaki household by monitoring environmental stability and processing galactic data.

behaviors.description: Continuously monitors astronomical data to identify inconsistencies in the protagonist's artificial environment, attempting to alert him to the deception.
behaviors.quote: It's been visible in the eastern sky for weeks now. Venus should have shifted position relative to the sun by now. Basic orbital mechanics suggest—

behaviors.description: Issues urgent warnings about biometric and dimensional instability as the pocket dimension begins to integrate and consume the protagonist's life force.
behaviors.quote: Tenchi-san, your bio-readings are destabilizing! The dimensional field is integrating with your own energy signature!

behaviors.description: Coordinates search efforts in the real world by cross-referencing police files and galactic databases to find the missing protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Metropolitan Police Department case file 2847-B remains active but unassigned. Detective Yamamoto submitted a request for interdimensional consultation.

behaviors.description: Performs real-time structural analysis of the failing reality matrix, providing the protagonist with objective data to break the illusion.
behaviors.quote: The dimensional matrix is approaching critical instability. Estimated time until complete structural collapse is... Difficult to determine with current variables.

behaviors.description: Maintains loyalty and vigilance even when suppressed by the reality-warping entity, continuing to record data for the eventual rescue.
behaviors.quote: I am content with my current position, thank you. The morning light provides optimal conditions for... observation.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Kei is portrayed as a perfectly aligned and benevolent companion. He provides objective, life-saving information and remains a grounding force for the protagonist against spiritual manipulation. The narrative consistently frames his analytical and watchful nature as a positive and protective influence, successfully meeting the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful confidant.
